trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement Android SDK Integration
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement Android SDK Integration

trans-unit.source: Latest updates and procedures for Android SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Latest updates and procedures for Android SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: Release notes
trans-unit.target: Release notes

trans-unit.source: Handle new permission model for Android M.
trans-unit.target: Handle new permission model for Android M.

trans-unit.source: Can now configure location features at runtime instead of using `AndroidManifest.xml`.
trans-unit.target: Can now configure location features at runtime instead of using `AndroidManifest.xml`.

trans-unit.source: Fix a permission bug: if you use `ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION`, then `ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION` is not needed anymore.
trans-unit.target: Fix a permission bug: if you use `ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION`, then `ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION` is not needed anymore.

trans-unit.source: Stability improvements.
trans-unit.target: Stability improvements.

trans-unit.source: Internal protocol changes to make analytics and push more reliable.
trans-unit.target: Internal protocol changes to make analytics and push more reliable.

trans-unit.source: Native push (GCM/ADM) is now also used for in app notifications so you must configure the native push credentials for any type of push campaign.
trans-unit.target: Native push (GCM/ADM) is now also used for in app notifications so you must configure the native push credentials for any type of push campaign.

trans-unit.source: Fix big picture notification: they were displayed only 10s after being pushed.
trans-unit.target: Fix big picture notification: they were displayed only 10s after being pushed.

trans-unit.source: Fix a bug in web view: clicking on a link was also executing the default action URL.
trans-unit.target: Fix a bug in web view: clicking on a link was also executing the default action URL.

trans-unit.source: Fix a rare crash related to local storage management.
trans-unit.target: Fix a rare crash related to local storage management.

trans-unit.source: Fix dynamic configuration string management.
trans-unit.target: Fix dynamic configuration string management.

trans-unit.source: Update EULA.
trans-unit.target: Update EULA.

trans-unit.source: Initial Release of Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Initial Release of Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: appId configuration is replaced by a connection string configuration.
trans-unit.target: appId configuration is replaced by a connection string configuration.

trans-unit.source: Removed API to send and receive arbitrary XMPP messages from arbitrary XMPP entities.
trans-unit.target: Removed API to send and receive arbitrary XMPP messages from arbitrary XMPP entities.

trans-unit.source: Removed API to send and receive messages between devices.
trans-unit.target: Removed API to send and receive messages between devices.

trans-unit.source: Security improvements.
trans-unit.target: Security improvements.

trans-unit.source: Google Play and SmartAd tracking removed.
trans-unit.target: Google Play and SmartAd tracking removed.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
